item.title: Kubernetes Swap and etcd Stability: Preventing Control Plane Hangs
item.description: When enabling swap on Kubernetes nodes, you might encounter a critical issue where misbehaving containers don’t get killed automatically. When this affects etcd, the API server generating excessive load and consuming all available resources. This post explains the problem and provides two solutions.
